name: github_issue_lister
description: A tool for listing open issues in a GitHub repository.

arguments.name: repo_name
arguments.description: The name of the repository in the format 'user/repo'.

arguments.name: limit
arguments.description: The maximum number of issues to list.

tools.return_value_description: A JSON object containing the status of the operation and a list of issue titles. The status can be 'success', 'empty', or 'error'. If the status is 'error', the object will also contain an error message.
